device_actions.get_installed_apps_api.ge.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Failed to retrieve the list of installed applications.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The application management service is not responding.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to get installed apps timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have permission to view installed applications.
Error 429: Too many requests - You have exceeded the rate limit for querying apps.

device_actions.open_app_api.open_app.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The application could not be opened.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The device is currently offline.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to open the application timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You are not authorized to open this application.
Error 404: Not Found - The specified application is not installed.

device_actions.open_camera_api.open_came.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The camera failed to open.
Error 503: Service unavailable - Cannot connect to the camera service.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to open the camera timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - Camera access is disabled by a security policy.
Error 409: Conflict - The camera is already in use by another application.

device_actions.open_home_screen_api.open.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Failed to return to the home screen.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The device's UI is not responding.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to open the home screen timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - This action is restricted by the device administrator.
Error 409: Conflict - A system process is blocking this action.

device_actions.open_url_api.open_url.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The URL could not be opened.
Error 504: Gateway Timeout - The network is unavailable.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to open the URL timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - Opening URLs is restricted on this device.
Error 400: Bad Request - The provided URL is malformed or invalid.

device_actions.open_websearch_api.open_w.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The web search could not be initiated.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The search provider is not reachable.
Error 408: Request timeout - The web search request timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - Web search is disabled on this device.
Error 400: Bad Request - The search query is empty or invalid.

device_actions.power_off_device_api.powe.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The device failed to power off.
Error 503: Service unavailable - Cannot communicate with the power management service.
Error 408: Request timeout - The power off command timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have the necessary permissions to power off this device.
Error 409: Conflict - A critical process is preventing the device from shutting down.

device_actions.record_video_api.record_v.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Video recording failed unexpectedly.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The camera hardware is not responding.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to record video timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have permission to record video.
Error 409: Conflict - The device has insufficient storage to record video.

device_actions.restart_device_api.restar.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The device failed to restart.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The system service required for restarting is unavailable.
Error 408: Request timeout - The restart command timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You are not authorized to restart this device.
Error 409: Conflict - The device cannot be restarted at this time due to an ongoing update.

device_actions.ring_phone_api.ring_phone.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The phone failed to ring.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The audio service is not responding.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to ring the phone timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have permission to ring this phone.
Error 409: Conflict - The phone is in silent mode and cannot be rung.

device_actions.take_photo_api.take_photo.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Failed to take a photo.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The camera is not available.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to take a photo timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have permission to use the camera.
Error 409: Conflict - Insufficient storage to save the photo.

device_actions.take_screenshot_api.take_.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The screenshot could not be taken.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The screen capture service is not running.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to take a screenshot timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - Taking screenshots is disabled by a policy.
Error 409: Conflict - Cannot take a screenshot due to protected content on screen.

device_actions.turn_off_flashlight_api.t.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The flashlight could not be turned off.
Error 503: Service unavailable - Cannot connect to the flashlight service.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to turn off the flashlight timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have permission to control the flashlight.
Error 409: Conflict - The flashlight is not currently on.

device_actions.turn_on_flashlight_api.tu.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The flashlight failed to turn on.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The flashlight hardware is unavailable.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to turn on the flashlight timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - Access to the flashlight is restricted.
Error 409: Conflict - The camera is in use, preventing the flashlight from turning on.
